title: Can't Upgrade to permanent skin using orange essence.
body: Just bought Vayne and was trying to Orange essence to upgrade the skin shard to a permanent skin. Dunno if it is a bug but I just want the Dragonslayer vayne skin.

replies.body: Looks like you just didn't have enough orange essence when you were trying to redeem Dragonslayer Vayne. From what I can tell it looks like you got it figured out though!
